title: Did the Taliban Endorse Trump While Scientific Community Endorsed Biden?
subtitle: A popular tweet used a shaky comparison to differentiate the U.S. presidential candidates in 2020.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: Before the 2020 U.S. presidential election, the Taliban and the Ku Klux Klan endorsed U.S. President Donald Trump while his Democratic opponent, Joe Biden, was “endorsed by a broad bipartisan coalition and the New England Journal of Medicine.”
